synopsis.text: In an alternate historical reality, a successful modern-day businessman named Yi Ning is transported back in time to the Wu Dynasty. Adopting the identity of Ning Yi, he joins the prominent Su merchant family by becoming the son-in-law. Though skilled in commerce, Ning Yi aspires to make a name for himself in the martial arts world of this ancient era that he has admired since childhood. However, he soon realizes that the complex social mores of this period are more intricate than he anticipated. As Ning Yi becomes embroiled in high-stakes court intrigues, the Su family faces threats from dangerous rival clans. To protect his new relatives, Ning Yi must utilize his business acumen and navigate tricky political waters. However, his longtime dream of becoming a martial arts hero may prove more difficult than expected. Ning Yiâ€™s adventures promise excitement as a fish-out-of-water in ancient China. Will cunning or combat carry the day? The alternate world of the Wu Dynasty holds opportunity and opposition for this ambitious stranger.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
